Package mmj.lang

Interface SyntaxVerifier

All Known Implementing Classes:
Grammar
public interface SyntaxVerifier
Interface to Syntax Verification (aka "Grammar", "grammatical parsing" and "syntactic analysis").

Refer to mmj.verify.GrammarConstants.java for information about parse parameters and error messages.

  • Method Details

    • parseFormula

      ParseTree parseFormula(Messages messages, Map<String,Sym> symTbl, Map<String,Stmt> stmtTbl, Formula formula, VarHyp[] varHypArray, int highestSeq, Stmt defaultStmtForRPN)
      Parse a single formula.

      Note: access to symTbl and stmtTbl is required in case the grammar needs to be re-initialized.

      Note: highestSeq is similar to the restriction in proof verification: a proof can only refer to previous statements. However, setting this to java.lang.Integer.MAX_VALUE says, parse this formula with the entire grammar -- which ought to result in the same parse, unless the grammar is ambiguous (new Grammar Rules should be "disjoint" from previous ones.)

      Parameters:
      messages - Messages object for error/info messages.
      symTbl - Symbol Table (Map).
      stmtTbl - Statement Table (Map).
      formula - Formula to parse.
      varHypArray - VarHyp's for the Formula's Var's.
      highestSeq - Max MObj.seq that can be referenced.
      defaultStmtForRPN - Default Stmt for output RPN/message.
      Returns:
      Array of Stmt containing RPN.

    • parseOneStmt

      ParseTree parseOneStmt(Messages messages, Map<String,Sym> symTbl, Map<String,Stmt> stmtTbl, Stmt stmt)
      Parse a single Statement.

      If used with VarHyp or SyntaxAxiom, simply returns stmt.getExprRPN().

      Note: access to symTbl and stmtTbl is required in case the grammar needs to be re-initialized.

      Parameters:
      messages - Messages object for error/info messages.
      symTbl - Symbol Table (Map).
      stmtTbl - Statement Table (Map).
      stmt - Stmt in stmtTbl to parse.
      Returns:
      Array of Stmt containing RPN.

    • parseAllFormulas

      void parseAllFormulas(Messages messages, Map<String,Sym> symTbl, Map<String,Stmt> stmtTbl)
      Parse all Statement Formulas and update stmtTbl with results.
      Parameters:
      messages - Messages object for error/info messages.
      symTbl - Symbol Table (Map).
      stmtTbl - Statement Table (Map).

    • initializeGrammar

      boolean initializeGrammar(Messages messages, Map<String,Sym> symTbl, Map<String,Stmt> stmtTbl)
      Initializes the grammar.

      Normally this is handled automatically. It initializes "the grammar" but does not parse every Stmt in stmtTbl.

      The intended use of this function would be to initialize the grammar without parsing every statement (parsing every statement in set.mm requires 8ish seconds!)

      Parameters:
      messages - Messages object for error/info messages.
      symTbl - Symbol Table (Map).
      stmtTbl - Statement Table (Map).
      Returns:
      true if grammar initializes successfully, else false.
